mosinstall.name: GCalendar upcoming events
mosinstall.author: allon
mosinstall.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License.
mosinstall.description: This module shows the upcoming events from a google calendar.

param.name: name
param.label: Calendar name
param.description: The name of the google calendar. Specified in the GCalendar component.

param.name: dateFormat
param.label: Date format
param.description: The format of the date for an event (see http://www.php.net/date for details).

param.name: timeFormat
param.label: Time format
param.description: The format of the time for an event (see http://www.php.net/date for details).

param.name: max
param.label: Max events
param.description: The maximal count of events should be displayed.

param.name: openWindow
param.label: Open event in new window
param.description: If the event should be opened in a new window or inside of joomla.

param.name: timezone
param.label: Timezone
param.description: The timezone the event details should be displayed.
